√day 'share'

present: [1.] dáyate etc. V.+  dayāmasi  

perfect: dayām  āsa  

[aorist: adayiṣṭa  dayiṣyate  dayitā  ]

verbal: dayita E.+  

secondary: intensive: dandayya-  dādayya-   -- causative: dayayet  

derivatives: dayā́ V.+  dayitnu S.  

A secondary form of √2dā 'divide', from which it is hardly worth separating.
